messages.content: What services does Sanjiwani Health provide?
Sanjiwani Health offers online doctor consultations, appointment booking, medical record storage, medicine delivery, and diagnostic test booking—all in one app.
How do I create a patient account?
Open the app, tap “Sign Up,” enter your basic details, verify your phone or email, and you’re ready to go.
Can I choose my preferred doctor?
Yes, you can browse doctors by specialization, experience, ratings, or availability before booking.
How do I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
Go to My Appointments → Select Appointment → Reschedule/Cancel, and confirm your changes.
Can I consult doctors from other cities?
Yes! Sanjiwani Health enables cross-city online consultations, so you can talk to specialists anywhere in India.
How do I receive my prescription after a consultation?
Your digital prescription will appear in the My Records section immediately after the doctor completes your consultation.
Can family members use my account?
You can add family members under Family Profiles, making it easy to book and manage appointments for them.
Can I track my health records over time?
Yes, your app automatically stores reports, prescriptions, and test results so you can monitor progress anytime.
Do I need internet access to use the app?
Some features work offline, like viewing downloaded prescriptions, but booking or consultations need internet access.
How can I contact customer support?
Type “Talk to Support” or email us at support@sanjiwanihealth.in for quick help.
How can doctors register?
Select Join as Doctor, complete your details, and upload verification documents. Our team will approve your profile within 24 hours.
Is there a fee for doctors to join?
Basic registration is free. Premium features like analytics and digital clinic management come with subscription plans.
How do I set my availability?
Go to Doctor Dashboard → Schedule → Set Availability to manage consultation hours.
Can I view a patient’s previous consultations?
Yes, you can view complete patient history, reports, and prescriptions from your dashboard.
How do I issue a digital prescription?
After consultation, click Generate Prescription, fill details, and submit—it will auto-save to the patient’s account.
Can hospitals register multiple doctors?
Yes, hospital admins can create sub-profiles for each doctor and manage all under one hospital dashboard.
How do I get payments for consultations?
Payments are automatically credited to your registered account within 48 hours after each session.
Can I conduct video consultations?
Yes, you can start a secure HD video call directly from your dashboard using the built-in video system.
How can I order medicines online?
Upload your prescription or select from your saved ones, choose a partner pharmacy, and confirm delivery.
How long does medicine delivery take?
Typically within 24–48 hours, depending on your location and pharmacy partner availability.
Can I track my medicine order?
Yes, go to My Orders to track your delivery in real time.
How can I book a diagnostic test?
Visit Diagnostics → Choose Test → Select Lab → Confirm Booking, and you’ll receive the appointment details instantly.
Will I get my lab reports digitally?
Yes, once your test is completed, the lab uploads your report, and it appears under My Reports.
Can I use health insurance for payments?
Yes, Sanjiwani Health supports selected health insurance partners. You can upload your policy details in your profile.
What can this chatbot do?
I can help you book doctors, order medicines, schedule lab tests, manage your health records, and answer basic health-related questions.
Can you recommend a doctor for my symptoms?
Sure! Please describe your symptoms or choose from categories like Fever, Skin Issues, Diabetes, etc.
Can you remind me to take my medicine?
Yes! You can set medicine reminders by typing “Set medicine reminder for [medicine name] at [time].”
Can I track my fitness and health data here?
Yes, you can sync your wearable devices to track vitals like heart rate, steps, and blood pressure.
What if I have an emergency?
In case of emergencies, I’ll show you the nearest hospitals and ambulance services immediately.
How do I update my profile?
Go to Profile → Edit Profile, make changes, and save.
I didn’t receive my OTP. What should I do?
Please check your network or use the “Resend OTP” option after 30 seconds.
How can I change my registered email or phone number?
Go to Settings → Account → Update Contact Info and verify your new details.
How do I change my password?
Click Forgot Password on the login screen or change it under Settings → Security.
How can I delete my account?
Navigate to Settings → Privacy → Delete Account, and your data will be securely erased within 48 hours.
The app is slow or not loading. What should I do?
Please clear cache, check for updates, or reinstall the app. If it persists, contact support.
How do I update the app?
Visit Google Play Store or Apple App Store, search “Sanjiwani Health,” and tap Update.
How can I give feedback on my doctor consultation?
After your session, rate your doctor and share feedback under My Consultations → Feedback.
Can I refer Sanjiwani Health to others?
Yes! Use your referral code in Profile → Refer & Earn to invite friends and earn rewards.
How do I report an issue or bug?
Type “Report issue,” and I’ll log it automatically or connect you to our support team.
Is Sanjiwani Health available in regional languages?
Yes, the app supports English, Hindi, and several Indian languages for better accessibility.
Does Sanjiwani Health have a premium plan?
Yes, premium members get unlimited consultations, faster service, and exclusive wellness features.
